name: Rubble and Rust - Part 3
description:
In part three, Bel and Lachlan start a bonfire to conceal their little secret. Things take a turn for the worse as Lachlan loses his grip on reality.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rubble and Rust is a thriller and coming-of-age visual novel set in rural South Australia. Created in Ren’Py engine. 18+ for adult themes and violence.

Australian country boonies. A time before WIFI. Sharp scrap metal. Too much free time and a secret under the burn pile out back. 

 The story is in 3 parts. Part 1 | Part 2 | Based around my lived experiences with the Australian countryside and mental health.

Art, code and writing all by me, vela. I will surely be talking  on my blog about what I've learnt from this project! I am not very techy and have just tried my best, so try not to hate me please. If you find any big issues please email velanoble (at) gmail (dot) com.
